name: Student LIST Report
query:
select
    sl.name as "Name",
    sl.school as "School",
    sl.school_name as "School Name",
    sl.academic_year as "Academic Year",
    sl.program as "Program",
    sl.section_name as "Section Name",
    sr.student_name as "Student name",
    sr.roll_number as "Roll Number",
    sr.conatct_number as "Conatct Number",
    sr.email as "Email"
from
    `tabStudents List`sl,
    `tabStudent records`sr
    
where
sr.parent = sl.name
